AboutMe:
In a nutshell, this is why I enjoy computer programming:

  • I do not think there is any thrill that can go through the human heart like that felt by the inventor as he sees some creation of the brain unfolding to success... such emotions make a man forget food, sleep, friends, love, everything. -Nikola Tesla

I am mainly interested in extensible programming and automatic pseudocode conversion.

Anagram generators are really awesome: I use them to generate acronyms for lists of words that I'm trying to learn.

Python, Ruby, and REBOL are my favorite programming languages.
